Dialogue.name: Emma
Dialogue.text: You are suppose to be walking along the path, which will leads you to take the IQ test

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: If it's the path that has no light, I can't walk through it. \n My body won't move an inch

Dialogue.name: Emma
Dialogue.text: Heh? Really? \n Seems like it's the same for you, too

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: What are you talking about?

Dialogue.name: Emma
Dialogue.text: I think there's another way for you

Dialogue.name: Emma
Dialogue.text: In the next room, the storage room, there is a computer sitting on the table. \n And, take this, it seems to be a hint on how to power on that in there
You received pictures.

Dialogue.name: Emma
Dialogue.text: Put your card in there and go back to the first room

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: What about you?

Dialogue.name: Emma
Dialogue.text: I'm going to read these papers for a while, might find something else

Dialogue.name: Butler
Dialogue.text: Good evening sir Elias, I’m waiting for you. Can you help me with this bookshelf?

Dialogue.name: Butler
Dialogue.text: Remember that you must not touch any books with black color. \n And try to adjust the rest of the books

Dialogue.name: Butler
Dialogue.text: Oh, and don’t forget to look into the mirror.

Dialogue.name: Butler
Dialogue.text: Don't forget to look into the mirror, it's just right in the middle of the bookshelf.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: What was that feeling! \n I felt like being picked up when I open the door.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: At least I got outside...a city, huh? \n Hm...I'm outisde but I can't feel the wind.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: Emma said she's going to wait on the upper floor. \n What does that even mean? \n I need to ask her about this.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: The mansion door turned into a picuture, just like my door.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: This means that I'm still stuck in the experiment. \n Hopefully, I'm not the one going crazy.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: ( These people with strange masks are looking at me )

Dialogue.name: NPC6
Dialogue.text: I heard a scientist just showed up.

Dialogue.name: NPC5
Dialogue.text: How?! \n We need to find that man.

Dialogue.name: NPC6
Dialogue.text: I think he used a secret tunnel to come here.

Dialogue.name: NPC5
Dialogue.text: He must be planning something weird to us! \n Let's go warn everyone!

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: ( A scientist st this place right now? \n This might be my exit )

Dialogue.name: NPC5
Dialogue.text: I heard that the scientist came here to kill us.

Dialogue.name: NPC5
Dialogue.text: They think we are of no use to them.

Dialogue.name: NPC6
Dialogue.text: I never heard of anyone who got pass this place.

Dialogue.name: NPC6
Dialogue.text: This experiment is just smoke and mirrors, they just want to kill us.

Dialogue.name: NPC5
Dialogue.text: The chief will save us! \n The chief is always right!

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: ( The chief? This place just gives me goosebumps )

Dialogue.name: NPC7
Dialogue.text: A scientist is hiding among us, it's going to kill us!

Dialogue.name: NPC4
Dialogue.text: We need to do something! \n We need to take care of that scientist!

Dialogue.name: NPC4
Dialogue.text: Who knows what kind of tortures are waiting for us if we get caught.

Dialogue.name: NPC7
Dialogue.text: The chief is searching for him, he'll tell us about it anytime soon. \n Right now he is preparing for our new rookie.

Dialogue.name: NPC4
Dialogue.text: I saw the writings in that scientist's paper, it says they are making clones of us.

Dialogue.name: NPC4
Dialogue.text: They are going to brainwash us to create their army of clones.

Dialogue.name: NPC7
Dialogue.text: Is this true?! They are treating us like a lab rat!

Dialogue.name: Cultist
Dialogue.text: Good day, you are the newcomer, yes? \n What's your name?

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: I'm Elias, and you? \n And why is everyone wearing some weird masks?

Dialogue.name: Cultist
Dialogue.text: So your name is Elias. \n Soon you will know why they have those smiles on their face.

Dialogue.name: Cultist
Dialogue.text: I am Noel, the leader of these people, and you are an individual that needs a guiding light.

Dialogue.name: Cultist
Dialogue.text: Thus why I am offering you to come with us.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: ( This person overly suspicious, only mad people would believe him )

Dialogue.name: Cultist
Dialogue.text: I know you probably have no interest in what I am doing. But I do believe, that is not a smart idea.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: What do you mean!

Dialogue.name: Cultist
Dialogue.text: In other words, I can assist you with the way out. \n Especially now, as I have got my hands on these fascinating data.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: ( Does he know the way out? )

Dialogue.name: Cultist
Dialogue.text: I have my duty -- to assist people in getting out. \nB ut not everyone gets the privilege.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: And what will I have to do for you to let me out?

Dialogue.name: Cultist
Dialogue.text: I'll answer your questions... after you've passed the test.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: Behind this? \n Isn't this a hologram?

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: Hm? \n My hand is going through the picture!
